actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to liberalize the provisions relating to payment of disability and death pension.

summary.text: Increases payments in specified amounts to veterans under non-service-connected disability pension plans. Increases pension payments to widows of veterans who at the time of death were receiving compensation or retirement pay for a service-connected disability. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 521(b),(c); 541(b),(c))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to liberalize the provisions relating to payment of disability and death pension.
